participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and outdoorsy, enjoys fitness and caring for pets.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and reflective, loves nature and is going through a period of change.
participant_2.background: i have a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange.
